title: Ex-nurse RaDonda Vaught sentenced to probation after injecting patient with wrong drug - New York Post
content:
1. Ex-nurse RaDonda Vaught sentenced to probation after injecting patient with wrong drug  New York Post
  2. Former VUMC nurse RaDonda Vaught sentenced to 3 years supervised probation  NewsChannel 5
  3. Tennessee nurse convicted in lethal drug error sentenced to three years probation  NPR
  4. RaDonda Vaught sentenced to three years probation on a diverted sentence, could see record wiped  Tennessean
  5. Former Tennessee nurse hears sentence after being charged  WHAS11
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A former Tennessee nurse whose medication error killed a patient was sentenced to three years of probation Friday health care workers warned that criminalizing such mistakes will lead to more deathâ€¦
